column5: Hi all, Self ICE-olation is going well, went out for crappie that were a bit slow so changed up lakes and went for Burbot instead, good fun.VIDEOhttps://youtu.be/ww2INz5fjZ0
thanks for posting the video Limey! How do you cook those burbot?
Very versatile fish, good fried baked etc... etc, but being as they are basically cod a beer batter is awesome.
Man, got me thinking of fresh beer battered canadian fish!!!
